item.title: Setting Up Web Server Internet Information Services (IIS) on Windows Server
item.description: 1. Overview In this tutorial we’re going to share how to setting up Web Server Internet Information Services (IIS) on windows server for deployment node js application. IIS is a web server feature on windows server. 2. Install the Web Server(IIS) in Server Manager Dashboard 3. Create new sites Right click Sites and then setting up, follow step bellow. 4. Open your sites Open your website with url / ip address setting up before.
